com.apple.eawt.event
Class GestureAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.eawt.event.GestureAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GestureListener, GesturePhaseListener, MagnificationListener, RotationListener, SwipeListener, java.util.EventListener
public abstract class GestureAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements GesturePhaseListener, MagnificationListener, RotationListener, SwipeListener

Abstract adapter class for receiving gesture events. This class is provided as a convenience for creating listeners. Subclasses registered with GestureUtilities#addGestureListenerTo() will receive all phase, magnification, rotation, and swipe events.

Since:
Java for Mac OS X 10.5 Update 7, Java for Mac OS X 10.6 Update 2
See Also:
GestureUtilities

          Invoked when a downward swipe gesture is performed by the user.

          Invoked when a leftward swipe gesture is performed by the user.

          Invoked when a rightward swipe gesture is performed by the user.
 void swipedUp(SwipeEvent e)
          Invoked when an upwards swipe gesture is performed by the user.
